tha-ap119:5.1: Otataṃ vitthataṃ → ogataṃ vitataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | otataṃ vitataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap119:5.2: suvicittavaṭaṃsakaṃ → suci cittaṃ papañcakaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed) | suvicittaṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap119:7.3: Pāṇabhūte → pāṇabhūnaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | pāṇabhūtaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap119:9.4: caritaṃ → karitaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed) | kāritaṃ (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
